name: Dungeon Masters (TheBrain271)
description: In this game, you play as Superdude, who is traversing a dungeon, in order to rescue the civilians trapped in the dungeon, and face the Bad Evil Dude(Superdude's arch-nemisis). This is a puzzle game in which you join together platforms via drag and drop to make a path for the player to move on. The path must reach all the civilians and the door. There is a boss fight with The Evil Bad Dude at the end of the game. This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.
